item.description:
Another easy after work ride. Let's call it Beginner+ and we can adjust the ride depending on the skill level of the riders that show up. Either way it will be an easy pace and no one will get left behind.

Parking is $2.

Email me with any questions.

http://www.mass.gov/d...

I am going to be in the paved parking lot close to the ice cream. Look for the blakc Volvo Cross Country.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the black Volvo wagon in the ice cream stand lot.
item.name: Thursday Night at Great Brook Farm
